name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Chifeng, Inner Mongolia, a disabled poor old man put his disability certificate on his head to defend his rights, and his account was subsequently blocked.
The old man said that he was targeted for poverty alleviation in 2016, and was lifted out of poverty by the government a year later. After being lifted out of poverty, he suffered from hunger and cold for two years, and was identified as a special poverty-stricken household, but has not received any benefits so far. Now his disability pension has also been cancelled, and he hopes that the relevant departments will give him a way out.
But then his account was blocked and the several videos he posted were deleted.

content: On February 8, Douyin issued an announcement: Zhang Lan and Wang Xiaofei’s accounts used the deceased to maliciously hype marketing and recommended false videos. They did not correct their behavior after being punished and were banned indefinitely. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjPm2WhaQAAXHH8.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Large companies expect China's economy to fail to recover in the short term, adding to pessimism over foreign trade tensions. French spirits maker Pernod Ricard and Danish beer giant Carlsberg warned on February 6 that they saw little sign of a rebound in Chinese consumer demand. This has added to pessimism about a bleak outlook for 2025 as corporate executives try to cope with rising global trade tensions. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjQVVoVa0AAbjfc.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 6, a retired soldier from Sichuan sent a video asking for help: He had served in the 77298th Army and participated in the rescue during the Wenchuan earthquake. Now he has a comminuted fracture due to an accident. Due to his poor family background and both his parents being disabled, he has no money for surgery. Although the relevant departments have provided assistance, it is only a drop in the bucket. I beg everyone to lend a hand. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888162975103754240/pu/img/WOZrh32KPnk_pz7i.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 6, 24 Republican members of the U.S. House of Representatives proposed a joint resolution, suggesting that the U.S. government end the "One China" policy and establish formal diplomatic relations with Taiwan, and called on the U.S. government to start bilateral free trade agreement negotiations with Taiwan to further increase U.S.-Taiwan economic and trade exchanges.
The joint resolution pointed out that the "One China Policy" is outdated, cannot reflect Taiwan's de facto sovereignty and independence over the past 70 years, and is not in the interests of the Taiwanese and American people. The resolution emphasizes that Taiwan has now established and maintained diplomatic relations with several countries, while also conducting cultural and economic exchanges, which shows Taiwan's independent status in the international community. The resolution urges the U.S. President to abandon the "One China" policy, recognize that Taiwan is an independent country, and recognize that Taiwan is not ruled by the Chinese government.
Taiwan's Ministry of Foreign Affairs said on Friday that it was grateful for the United States' firm support for Taiwan and for strengthening U.S.-Taiwan relations...
fullContent:
2月6日，美国24位共和党众议员提出一项共同决议案，建议美国政府结束 “一中” 政策，同台湾建立正式的外交关系，并呼吁美国政府与台湾开启双边自由贸易协定谈判，以进一步增加美台经贸交往。
 这项共同决议案指出，“一中政策”已经过时，无法反映台湾在过去70多年来事实上的主权独立状况，也不符合台湾和美国民众的利益。决议案强调，台湾现在已经同几个国家建立并维持外交关系，同时还进行文化和经济往来，这显示了台湾在国际社会的独立地位。决议案敦促美国总统应放弃“一个中国”的政策，承认台湾是一个独立国家，并且承认台湾不受中国政府的统治等。
 台湾的外交部周五就此表示，感谢美国对台湾的坚定支持，以及加强美台关系的举措。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Caixin.com: Bribery + money laundering, former deputy director of Beijing Financial Bureau Hao Gang was sentenced to 11 years in prison in the first instance.
According to Caixin's understanding from multiple channels, Hao Gang was involved in Bitcoin money laundering; in addition, he also assisted a senior executive of a leading Bitcoin mining company to lift border control, and the bribes may have reached 10 million yuan. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjQi2TFbIAAvzg1.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师

content:
On February 7, a report revealed that in Linyi, Shandong, a marriage registration office had a long queue of nearly 400 people who were applying for divorce after the Chinese New Year, which was dozens of times more than the number of people applying for marriage.
The staff of the registration office responded that because they were all in a hurry to complete the procedures and go out to work, the registration office opened at 8:30, and some people lined up at the door at 8 o'clock in the morning. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888179213418864640/pu/img/w-b40zATAqgQrZY8.jpg

Xi Jinping made important instructions on the landslide in Yibin, Sichuan: do everything possible to search and rescue the missing people. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888183497682194432/pu/img/UFHvAnXFjCZLsTED.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Canada bans DeepSeek on government devices

According to a Bloomberg report on Friday: Canada's Chief Information Officer Dominique Rochon wrote in an email: "Because the improper collection and retention of sensitive personal information raises serious privacy issues, as a precautionary measure to protect government networks and data, it is recommended that departments and agencies restrict the use of the DeepSeek chatbot on government devices."

In a memo released Thursday, he also said that the Shared Services Agency, the agency responsible for Canada's government information technology network, has restricted the app on all devices it supports. He urged other departments to "consider blocking the app and website on their networks and devices."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Student submission from Hunyuan Middle School, Hunyuan County, Datong City, Shanxi Province
Hello, Mr. Li, I am a student of Hunyuan Middle School, Hunyuan County, Datong City, Shanxi Province. We are a national poverty-stricken county. After Mr. Li spoke out for these high schools, I was deeply touched and thanked Mr. Li for letting everyone know that all videos posted on Douyin were reported and removed by the school. Today I came to complain to Mr. Li about the exploitation of students and parents by Hunyuan Middle School.
On the fourth day of the Chinese New Year this year, February 1, our school started school. During the holiday, it was less than a week, not to mention the work and rest schedule, which was 6 am to 11 pm, very typical. But in such a poor area, the school still charges high custody fees. After the start of the double reduction, the state allows charging custody, and ours is obviously dozens of times higher than the charging standard. We have a holiday every two weeks, which means four days of custody a month. Before, the school often charged custody fees of 300-400 yuan from time to time, and never disclosed the custody time...
fullContent:
山西省大同市浑源县浑源中学学生投稿
李老师你好，我是山西省大同市浑源县浑源中学的一名学生，我们这里是国家级贫困县。在李老师为这些高中发声后，我深有感触，也感谢李老师能让大家知道，在抖音发布视频均被该校举报下架，今天我来向李老师控诉浑源中学对学生和家长的压榨。
今年大年初四，即2月1日 ，我们学校便开学了，期间放假就是不到一周的时间，作息就更不用提了，就是早6晚11，很典型。而是在这样一个贫困的地区，学校仍收取高额托管费，在双减开始后，国家允许收费托管，而我们这显然高出了收费标准的几十倍，我们是两周放一次假，也就是一个月托管四天，之前学校经常不定期收取托管费用300-400元，并且从未公开托管时间，单价，明细，想怎么收怎么收，一天单价接近一百元，学校每个年级有1000多人，共3000多人，托管费用难以想象，不知道进了谁的口袋里。
在暑假托管的一个月结束后，难以想象高一也要托管，提前开学，托管费用从来都是口头，不在任何微信群留痕迹，在开学后的一次家长会，未事先说明收费，进去后便让家长缴纳托管费3000元，全校这就是900w，实在难以想象，国家也不对这部分钱进行监管和审查，据说上面查到我校有巨额资金流动，但也之后查完不了了之。在现在如此差的经济形势之下，学校老师，领导依然剥削学生家长，让社会钱财的分配更加不合理，就进了部分人的口袋，据学校老师所说托管期间一天上一节课有400元的收入，所以在我们这个国家级贫困县，有很多老师收入也有一万以上，这给学生家长造成了极大的压力，我们这有很多家长都是务农的，根本没什么收入，就这样，全县都很穷，只有这所学校的老师，领导盆满钵满。
再者，该校极不重视学生的身体和心理健康，建立学生规范行为规范，处处扣分，事事违反扣分，来训练学生听话，扣到五十分强制开除，而被开除的一般都是没背景的，没关系的，有关系的过两天就回来了。真的可笑。
在两名学生尝试跳楼后，校长便把全校的窗户都封死了，以免阻挡他的升官发财之路。此后便没有任何人性化的将该两名学生开除了，哈哈哈哈，我是第一次见。之后再也没人敢有这样的举动。
再一个，高考成绩提升的原因也是高考考场秩序极乱，我们本地人，及考生都知道，由于高考主场优势，早就在考场模拟完了，也知道同校的谁跟自己坐在一起，并不是由如此疯狂的托管时间来提升的成绩。
更无奈的是自己只是知道这一切，却无力改变，便更痛苦了。希望大家能知道这所学校所作所为。

此致

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 7, Russian Prime Minister Mishustin said that Russia's GDP grew by 4.1% in 2024, reaching a record high of 200 trillion rubles.
Mishustin told Putin that we have withstood the pressure, and the countries that have imposed sanctions on us are now stagnant economically.
Putin said that the economic development results in 2024 are satisfactory, and 2025 should be a year of balanced economic development. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjROsjnbYAAIlL6.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 7, Tangshan Nanhu Hospital, a tertiary hospital with an investment of 2 billion yuan, was reported to be bankrupt. The hospital has stopped accepting patients. The building is empty, the doors of the clinics are closed, and there are only a few staff members in the corridor. There are ambulances at the door of the hospital to pick up patients for discharge.
A doctor from the hospital said: If I don’t get paid this month, it means I’ve worked for nothing. There are still many people on the job. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888225324238077952/pu/img/MPKoWVDjvIUvCwGX.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The party secretary and mayor of Yuxi City, Yunnan Province, were replaced within a month, which is rare. Some Hong Kong media pointed out that this was related to the mass demonstrations triggered by the arrest of local Islamic clergy at the end of last year.
Sing Tao Daily reported that in order to maintain the stability of the cadre team, China's local party and government "top leaders" rarely make synchronous adjustments, and inferred that Wang Li, the former party secretary of Yuxi City, and Jiang Hua, the former mayor, stepped down because of political responsibility for major local accidents.
In December last year, Ma Cunguang and Ma Yuwei, the father and son of the imam (Islamic clergy) of Yuxi Daying Mosque, were officially accused of being "fake religious clergy" and were ordered to stop studying and explaining the Koran; around December 15, Ma Yuwei and his family were taken away by the police, causing a large number of believers to protest, and hundreds of people gathered outside the city government for two consecutive days to demonstrate. The article pointed out that ethnic and religious matters are no small matter, and this incident has a bad political impact. Wang Li and Jiang Hua may step down and bear political responsibility for this.
...
fullContent:
云南玉溪市市委书记和市长罕见地在一个月内先后换人。有港媒指这与去年底当地伊斯兰教职人员被捕后触发群众示威事件有关。
 星岛日报报道指出，为了维持干部队伍稳定，中国地方党政“一把手”极少同步调整，并推断玉溪市原市委书记王力与原市长江华是因为地方发生重大事故而需承担政治责任而下台。
 去年12月，玉溪大营清真寺阿訇（伊斯兰教教职人员）马存光、马玉巍父子被官方指为“假冒宗教教职人员”，并被勒令停止可兰经的学习和讲解活动；12月15日左右，马玉巍和家人被警方带走，引起大批信众抗议，数百人连续两天聚集在市政府门外示威。 文章指出，民族宗教无小事，这起事件政治影响恶劣，王力和江华或因此下台承担政治责任。
 另据分析，玉溪新任书记周建忠曾任丽江、昆明两市公安局局长和云南省公安厅副厅长、常务副厅长，这次调任玉溪，官方显然是要铁腕维稳。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In Guang'an, Sichuan, the fallen criminal court president Yang Jun confessed that he created his own "sentencing principle" during his tenure as a judge, and reduced the sentence of those who gave money to a greater extent.
Chinese law gives judges the power of discretion, and judges have the power to make independent and fair judgments based on their work experience and understanding of the law. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjRfPUYaUAAK4L-.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Guangdong criminal defense lawyer Yu Anping: In recent years, the openness of judicial trials has gradually shrunk, and secret trials have become the "new normal". For example: secret court hearings, limited number of spectators, and no strangers allowed to attend; secret verdicts, the judgment documents do not respond to the lawyer's legal opinions, "you argue yours, I judge mine"; secret verdicts, and the judgment documents are not made public. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjRleHubwAA6pb2.jpg
